value.title: ElevenLabs introduces AI Dubbing, translating video and audio into 20 languages
value.excerpt: ElevenLabs' AI Dubbing tool can translate speech into more than 20 languages while retaining the original speaker's voice.

value.title: AI Language Models Could Assist Schizophrenia Diagnostics
value.excerpt: Scientists at the UCL Institute for Neurology have developed new tools, based on AI language models, that can characterise subtle signatures in the speech of patients diagnosed with schizophrenia.

value.title: Dubformer Launches AI Video Dubbing Solution for Media Industry
value.excerpt: Dubformer, a leading AI dubbing start-up specializing in delivering broadcast-level quality dubbing and voice-over services to the media industry, announces the launch of its AI video dubbing service. The solution supports 70+ languages and language variants, and 1000+ voices.
